Reviews.Title: good phone but it's buggy
Reviews.Author: Shanrui Zhang
Reviews.Content: according so many users' review, the 850mhz umts (3g band) is not working. that means you don't get 3g connection with ATT in USA or in Canada.pretty bad.worst thing is that samsung doesn't even admit the problem is existing.

Reviews.Title: No 3G in North America
Reviews.Author: Hendrick Chan
Reviews.Content: This model does not support 3G in North America. Sim 2 doesn't support the 850mhz GSM band. Google Apps are not available on this model either. So might be useful in China, but not in the USA.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Willie M.
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. Works very well has a long battery life. Voice clarity is good and the stylus separates this from other phones.

Reviews.Title: AMazing device
Reviews.Author: Ish
Reviews.Content: The phone is great works so well. From the moment you start using it, you will notice how nice it.Great phone for people that travel a lot.The seller was really help with questions about the product, very fast replies.  Item shipped out quickly and arrived a day before it was suppose to, which meant i was able to get my hands on it that much quicker.I recommend both the item and the seller.Please keep up the good work.
